channel.title: Why not change the looks of clients?
channel.description:
[b]Hello. My name is starwarsfz and i'm here to bring up a few questions![/b]
Why do all the clients use the same old login gray box?
Why not change it up and design your own? Or do you have to use that? I know i've seen people change the background but never the login box.
I am intrested in designing my own client graphics but i can't code for nothin but i want to make skins for people to download and use for there client. is that a good idea or not?Okay thats all. I know it's short but it's what i need to ask to see if its possible because i want to make custom skins. It would look like this but better this is just a crapy example! [IMG]http://i214.photobucket.com/albums/cc172/starwarsfz/skin-1.gif[/img] By the way I don't know if that is a real ip address.
P.S. If this is in the wrong spot may a mod please move it. Or if it go's nowhere then lock it, i don't want to break any rules.
Also I do want to learn how to code my own client so if anyone knows a link that can help me in that, that would be just Great![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 28, 2008, 08:38:08 pm[/size][hr]Any one?

item.title: Why not change the looks of clients?
item.dc:creator: @starwarsfz starwarsfz
item.description:
@starwarsfz wrote:

Ok well I have never seen one. Well thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Why not change the looks of clients?
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

A lot of people use custom login boxes and buttons already.

Read full topic
item.source: Why not change the looks of clients?
